description.narrative: With GGF Funds, Associacao de Produtores e Produtoras Rurais da Agricultura Familiar do Municipio de Tome Acu (APRAFAMTA) (Association of Rural Family Farmers in the City of Tome Acu), will purchase seed drying equipment to be shared by its members. This machinery will allow the members to add greater value to their products by burning the husks of cupuacu, cacao, acai, bacabi, and other crops in order to sell the pulps at a high quality. This will speed up the process of extracting oils and butters from the crops. Additionally, the Association will use the investment to encourage the recovery of degraded farmlands through the use of new agro forestry systems.
